mapper.select: select * from user where id =#{id} and password=#{password}
select password from user where id =#{id} and name=#{name};
mapper.insert: insert into user(id, password, name, email, address, phone,regiDate, grade) values(#{id},#{password},#{name},#{email},#{address},#{phone},#{regiDate},#{grade})
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
